thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Sue Paolucci
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Sue Paolucci

author: Sue Paolucci
title: Sue Paolucci
text:
What a fabulous experience I had there..My car would not stop shaking and pulling. I had an alignment done, but it still was not right, they balanced my tires, it still was the same so they rotated my tires and balanced them again. Unfortunately it still was the same. I took my car to my dealer they did a high end balance and found out I had 3 humps in 3 of my tires.. I tried to get road hazard from my dealer pay for the tires but it got denied.
Townfare Tires paid for my high end balancing at my dealership, so I decided to go and get 4 new tires from them.
Doug helped me through all if this, he was kind and patient with me, extremely helpful,. I would truly recommend Townfare Tire in Chicopee to anyone in search of a balance, alignment, or new tires.
All of the staff were friendly, but Doug was my go to and he was fantastic
